Class EduFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.ku.voltset.fragments.EduFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class EduFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Fragment responsible for showing Edu tab tab is for educational purposes with an animated image arrow

    chmod
